title.rendered: Protein Coffee Shakes and Smoothies for Weight Loss

content.rendered:
Protein Coffee Shakes and Smoothies for Weight Loss

Protein Coffee Shakes and Smoothies for Weight Loss

Learn more!

Skip the iced coffee, and start your day with a coffee protein shake!

These recipes are packed full of antioxidants and other nutrients that can help you burn fat.

Learn more

Basic Protein Shake

1

To build some lean muscle, simply add whey protein powder into your iced coffee. This makes the drink sweet and perfect for those trying gain weight!

Learn more

Banana Coffee Protein Shake

2

Add frozen bananas along with unsweetened almond milk for a thick, frosty shake for breakfast!

Learn more

Peanut Butter Coffee 

3

Swap the protein powder for peanut butter to make your smoothie taste more like a milkshake.

Learn more

Up & At ‘Em Breakfast Smoothie

4

This smoothie is loaded with oats for protein and fiber that will keep you fuller longer.

Learn more

Mocha Smoothie

5

A chocolaty coffee
 smoothie with a green healthy twist!

Learn more

Click the link below for more details on these coffee protein smoothie recipes and more!

Get More Details!

elements.content: Skip the iced coffee, and start your day with a coffee protein shake!
These recipes are packed full of antioxidants and other nutrients that can help you burn fat.
To build some lean muscle, simply add whey protein powder into your iced coffee. This makes the drink sweet and perfect for those trying gain weight!
Add frozen bananas along with unsweetened almond milk for a thick, frosty shake for breakfast!
Swap the protein powder for peanut butter to make your smoothie taste more like a milkshake.
This smoothie is loaded with oats for protein and fiber that will keep you fuller longer.
